rules_text:
Manifest wonder, then put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. [i](Draw a card, then put a card from your hand onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
Jump-start [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]
